original_text: He causes clever people to become ashamed. He causes leaders to do foolish things. He causes clever people to become ashamed.
korean_text: 모사를 벌거벗겨 끌어 가시며 재판장을 어리석은 자가 되게 하시며

sentences.original_text: He causes clever people to become ashamed
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 지혜로운 사람들이 부끄러움을 당하게 하신다

sentences.original_text: He causes leaders to do foolish things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 지도자들이 어리석은 일을 하게 하신다

sentences.original_text: He causes clever people to become ashamed
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 지혜로운 사람들이 부끄러움을 당하게 하신다
